metadata.title: CVE-2016-8619 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The function `read_data()` in security.c in curl before version 7.51.0 isvulnerable to memory double free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8619` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.2
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.2
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.2
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.2').
